entities.name: Codex
entities.description: Systematic scanning, comprehensive inventory, and structured planning model (GPT-5.2)

entities.name: Sonnet
entities.description: Cross-reference checking, dependency validation, and codebase verification model

entities.name: Snippet struct
entities.description: Code structure shared between inner_voice and curiosity_search

entities.name: inner_voice
entities.description: Functionality targeted for removal from the codebase

entities.name: curiosity_search
entities.description: Search functionality that shares the Snippet struct

entities.name: tool_schemas.rs
entities.description: File containing tool schema definitions with existing drift

entities.name: KG candidate tables
entities.description: Knowledge graph tables written to by inner_voice

relationships.description: Codex created the removal plan for inner_voice
Sonnet verified the plan and caught a critical issue
The Snippet struct is used by curiosity_search
Only inner_voice writes to the KG candidate tables

observations.content: A two-phase Codex -> Sonnet (Plan -> Verify) workflow is highly effective for significant refactoring.
observations.context: Verification caught a build-breaker that the initial planning phase missed.

observations.content: Significant drift exists between tool_schemas.rs, main.rs, and the actual tool count.
observations.context: tool_schemas expects 6, main.rs says 10, actual count is 9.

boundaries.reason: It is a dependency for curiosity_search

summary: Assessment of the Codex -> Sonnet workflow for inner_voice removal, highlighting the value of a two-phase plan-verify approach and identifying existing technical debt in tool accounting.
